name: Are you winning sun?
description:
Taking inspiration from Katamari Damacy, you play as a small sun that gets bigger and bigger as you ... join together with smaller celestial bodies through gravity. As you move around space, getting close to small planets will bring them into orbit until you get enough, and then they will get consumed. Watch out though, get too close to a bigger planet and get consumed yourself.

This is my submission for the GMTK 2021 game jam where the theme is "Joined Together"!

Movement - WASD

Boost -Spacebar
